ComicInfo.Summary:
Death Line: Savage commandeers the Death Train, and uses it to blow up the Liquidation Camp at the end of the line.
Flesh Book 1 Part 12: The dinosaurs break through the laser fence, causing the fleshdozers to shut off as every man is used for defense.
Harlem Heroes Part 12: Giant, Slim, and Hairy tour a sports museum and meet up with their next opponent's team leader, 'Red' Macardle.
Hollow World Part 1: Dan Dare accepts a job as a new navigator on Rok's ship the Titan I.C., while The Mekon and The Two of Verath make evil plans.
The Laser Hound: Probe's "gotta strip for action" defeat the metal-hunting Laser Hound tank.
Robot Wars, Part 3: "Make War - Not Breakfast!" The robot uprising continues with the Heavy Metal Kids!
